{{cpp/memory/unsynchronized_pool_resource/title|release}}
{{cpp/memory/unsynchronized_pool_resource/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|since=c++17| 1=
void release();
}}
{{dcl end}}

Releases all memory owned by this resource by calling the {{tt|deallocate}} function of the upstream memory resource as needed.

Memory is released back to the upstream resource even if {{tt|deallocate}} has not been called for some of the allocated blocks.
